nodes.text: Lake Vis was a deep body of water located north of the city Harte Secur on the planet Naboo. It was an abundant source of gooberfish and was also inhabited by the predatory colo claw fish and opee sea killer. The lake shared its name with Vis, another Naboo city. In 32 BBY, during the Invasion of Naboo by the Trade Federation, the company captured Harte Secur and gathered fish from Lake Vis using utility trawlers. When the Gungans under Boss Rugor Nass planned to liberate Harte Secur, they built a camp west of Lake Vis.

Lake Vis appeared in the 2001 LucasArts video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds in the sixth level of the Gungan campaign, entitled "The Liberation of Harte Secur." It was identified in the level's reconnaissance report.
